gui
Class BoardView

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Canvas
          gui.BoardView
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class BoardView
extends java.awt.Canvas
implements GameListener

This is the main view of the game.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Nested Class Summary
protected  class BoardView.Listener
          This class is used to catch all events happening to the BoardView, and filter them.
protected  class BoardView.Updater
          Provides a simple way to ask repetitively the view to update itself.
 class BoardView.ViewRange
          Represents a range of the view from one Square to another.
